name: bwh
description: Build With Hardware (BWH) - Educational drone kit ecosystem

scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w web" "npm run start:dev -w api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w web && npm run build -w api
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w web && npm run lint -w api
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w web && npm run typecheck -w api
